div.p: To Theodoros, the strategus of the Arsinoite, Meris of Herakleides, from Ptolemaios, son of Pakysis, from the village of Karanis. Today, which is the 23rd of the current month of Phaophi, some, Euhemeros and his brother Ptolemaios, came into the field which I have on lease as land under lien at Psenarpsenesis ... and they ... taking away ... by me ? [â€¦] Translation: E.A. Selim, P.Cair.Mich. 2 17
